headline: We're Not Near an AI Bubble: BlackRock's Chaudhuri
summary: Gargi Chaudhuri, BlackRock Chief Investment and Portfolio Strategist, says bank earnings are a strong signal that consumers remain resilient. She tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on "The Close" that we're nowhere near an AI bubble, emphasizing there will be both winners and losers in the space.

headline: Bitcoin ETFs See $536 Million in Outflows as BTC Wilts Below $110K
